(ROOT
  (NP (NNS Claypots) (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Claypots-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP (RB just) (RB not))
      (VP (VBN meant)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NNS hawkers)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB use))))))
    (. .)))

xcomp(meant-5, use-9)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJS Most))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS hawkers))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP sell)
                (S
                  (NP (NNP Claypot) (NN rice))

                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (ADVP (RB usually))
                        (VP (VB discard)

                              (QP (RB only) (DT a) (JJ few)))))))))))))))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP New) (NNP Lucky) (NNP Claypot) (NNP Rice))

              (S
                (S

                      (NP (DT a) (NNP Clementi)))))

                  (VP (VB eat)))
                ('' '')))))))

            (NP (PRP it))))
        (, ,)))))
